title: Masumoto - Shinjuku-ku
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The Monzen-nakacho branch of this company prepares Japanese bento boxes. The company's main branch is located in Kameido at 2-45-8 Kameido, Koto-ku, Tokyo. Typically offers around 5 varieties of vegan macrobiotic line called wasei shoku but in limited quantities, so call ahead or go before the lunch crowd. Take-outs only. Also sells freshly-steamed daikon manju (white radish & vegetable buns). Ask for macrobi bento.
